com.batataproductions.game.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.batataproductions.game.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener
    Controls the physics aspect of the game.

                            com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
        Processes this player movement.
        Parameters:
        movementMask - A bit mask which represents the direction the player is going.
        dt - time since last time inputs where handled in seconds
        camera - the camera being used in the gameview class for the libgdx screen.
